name: Shadow Go Home
description:
Controls:

  • Jump: Space or W
  • Left/Right: Left/Right Arrow or A/D

Description:

You start out with no sight (not literally that would be no fun), you must navigate your way towards greater levels of sight as new paths open to you.

Ludum Dare 45:

This Game was made for Ludum Dare 45 with the Theme of "Start With Nothing."

Credits:

Programming: Stewart Chandler (Algebru)

Art: Lukas Harman (HorseSaysQuack)

  • https://www.instagram.com/the.gwakamolay/

Note:

I do not own a mac or linux pc so I can not attest to the quality of those executable
